Author: abaiti
Title: [ANN] BURON üöÄ Next Generation Mining
Body: Hello, you don't need pay more for elecricity. The main isea of our soft is using panel, BUT not consol. It's very convinient to control your mining process with Buron software. You could read the FAQ of our project. https://goo.gl/GNRH46 Thank you!

Author: zenmining
Title: [ANN] BURON üöÄ Next Generation Mining
Body: Hi, this is Denis - founder of BURON project.  Actually right now our software works only with GPU. What does it mean - works? You can install BURON miner manager on your GPUs start it and than manage all your device from one place. To manage ASICs we will develop device that will work with ASICs.  Benefits is easy way to manage and monitor your mining hardware. And soon when we release stable version miner can increase profit by using BURON

Title: [ANN] BURON üöÄ Next Generation Mining

Author: jadenunderhill
Title: [ANN] BURON üöÄ Next Generation Mining
Body: I've studied your so called project, and I have only one question - Are you kidding!?  You are trying to gether almost ETH 2 000 (!) (near $1.5 million) And what for?  Your "product beta" in an application that simply executes Claymore miner. And that's all! And ou developed this for 6 months!   In my opinion BURON is SCAM.   If it is not , then I really do not know what scam is.

Author: zenmining
Title: [ANN] BURON üöÄ Next Generation Mining
Body: Thank you for your feedback  Actually I like comments like this, because this is opportunity to share more information about our project.   You are trying to gether almost ETH 2 000 (!) (near $1.5 million) And what for? This is hard cap. We didn't have a goal to raise all the 2000 ETH, 2'000'000 token is minimum we need to make 1.0 release. So 2000 ETH can be raised in 1 year, for example.   Your "product beta" in an application that simply executes Claymore miner. And that's all! And ou developed this for 6 months! We are very glad that you studied our product. And you absolutely right that right now BURON uses Claymore to mine (actually we can use any miner). But this is the tip of the iceberg. We trying to release beta ASAP to get customers feedback and make our product together with our customers. Writing code is not only we do last 6 months, we make customers development with a lot of miners, trying different software to understand market, we use different technologies to select what best fit us, and a lot other stuff.  We create basic core, bones of the project. Next we need to construct other parts of body.  Our release is a small part of what we do. Right now we testing features, that soon will be released: * Grab data from mining pools. We already can work with pools data, but it is not on public * Compare data form pools and miners logs. While mining we have a lot of different data about hardware, pools data and technology specific data. The goal is to bring all data together to human understandable format * Mass management * Get data from third party services. Like whattomine or blockchain explorer * Telegram bot for monitoring and management * Also currently we are working on BURON box, this device will manage ASICs  This is part small part of our backlog, we need to do a lot to make v.1.0   In my opinion BURON is SCAM. If it is not , then I really do not know what scam is.  May be I didn't understand what is SCAM,  but I know 100% that mining software is VERY HUGE AND GROWING MARKET. So our goal is develop company with $2M monthly profit in next 2-3 years. So what you prefer - $1,5M right now or $1,5 every month in next 2-3 years?

Author: Rainesse
Title: [ANN] BURON üöÄ Next Generation Mining
Body: What are the main differences of your software from such as NiceHash and Minergate?

Author: zenmining
Title: [ANN] BURON üöÄ Next Generation Mining
Body: Hi and thank you for your question!  NiceHash and MinerGate is close to our functionality.  In NiceHash you can sell or buy mining power, and get profit in BTC. It is marketplace. You can't tune your hardware and be notify if, for example, one of your GPU is down. We making tool for complex managing and monitoring mining hardware, and also we have completed solutions for big miners and mining hotels. Also on nicehash you cannot mine, for example monero, you always get BTC - because you didn't mine, you lease your hardware.  MinerGate is great product (as well as NiceHash). But first of all this is mining pool, you can select coin to mine and start mining on minergate pool. With BURON you can mine on any pool.  NiceHash, MinerGate and BURON - different products but yes, it looks like very similar.  Right now you can use BURON to take full control of your GPU mining hardware. Monitor what happens, tune it, select coins and pool you prefer and get BURON award!  What we are developing is BMW in world of mining. Sometimes it looks like Toyota or Mercedes, somebody thinks that best is Chevrolet...

Author: par0ll
Title: [ANN] BURON üöÄ Next Generation Mining
Body: It is so cute then you answer some questions from your bots. In fact in 10 days the project has collected only 1 eth (I'm sure they threw it themselves).  Do not waste time on this "ICO"

Author: zenmining
Title: [ANN] BURON üöÄ Next Generation Mining
Body: Hi! Thank you for your questions!  First of all we didn't use any bots only my and abaiti commented from BURON. But it seems people asked good questions, if you think so.   In fact in 10 days the project has collected only 1 eth (I'm sure they threw it themselves).  Yes, you absolutely right. We invest in marketing right now, something about $10 and what we do - not sprint, it's marathon. We just start and a lot of our resources goes on testing and customers support.  In 2018 we plan to be more transparent in our blog and tell everybody how does our project live.  Please keep tune.
